title: The Novel Magazine
additional-notes: This is a British publication.  Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

This magazine frequently reprinted stories that had previously appeared in other publications.  We have not checked the status of the reprinted stories, some of which may still have active copyrights. (The first renewed contribution mentioned here is the earliest contribution with an active CCE renewal record specifically mentioning this magazine.)
